text: A user wants to retrieve 8 images from a Web page. The user clicks a base HTML file to get the base HTML files for 8 images. Suppose that the size of base HTML page and all images are 2 KB. Assume that the data rate is 2 Mbps. The round-trip time (RTT) for sending control or HTTP requests is 100 milliseconds. What is the overall retrieve time (in sec) in the case of non-persistent HI'TP with no parallel TCP connection? Assume that 1K = 103 and 1M = 106. (Rounded off to three decimal places)
